tables.name: BankAccountContractLockRequest
tables.description: A bank account contract lock request is a request to maintain locks on product features and transactions of bank account contract.Bank account contract is a view of a bank contract.

columns.name: ID
columns.description: Is an identifier of a bank account contract lock request. Example: 105

columns.name: BankAccountContractUUID
columns.description: An universal unique identifier of a bank account contract. Example: 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef

columns.name: ChangeStateID
columns.description: An unique identifier of a bank account contract lock request for a change state. Example: 2019-07-13T13:34:46Z

columns.name: EventCode
columns.description: A coded representation of the event of a bank contract lock request. Example: 4841

columns.name: EventName
columns.description: Name of EventCode. Example: Debit Card Lock (for Account)

columns.name: UserStatusCode
columns.description: A coded representation of the user status of a bank contract lock request. Example: 2

columns.name: ValidityStartDate
columns.description: The validity start date for a bank contract lock request. Example: 2017-04-13

columns.name: ValidityEndDate
columns.description: The validity end date for a bank contract lock request. Example: 2017-04-13

columns.name: BusinessProcessChainAssignment
columns.description: Business Process Chain Assignment is the assignment of a business object node to a business process chain.

columns.name: Note
columns.description: A note on bank contract lock request about the lock. Example: Customer deceased April 01, 2019
